title: Oceania Rank Queue (2017)
body:
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}} My though on Oceania rank is in the middle.  I like the new queues (Solo/Duo and Flex).  I don't play on the Flex Queue purely because I don't find it competitive.  I'm not here talking about it being bad or not.  (You can talk about that yourself).  I'm here asking why would Solo/Duo queue be gone around 3-6 am (Australian Time I think.  Correct me if I'm wrong.)  I'm from New Zealand so its worst because the the queue is gone at 6-9 am. I could be trying to play a game then notice that the Solo/Duo queue is gone. Same goes for the Flex queue.  Its gone at 9-11 am (New Zealand time I think.  Correct me if I'm wrong) I don't have a problem if flex is gone because I don't play on it.  But for someone that wants to play flex, it wouldn't be fair for them to wait for the queue to be back.  Sure they could play normal/aram/other rank queue/special game mode that out right then.

TL;DR

I don't mind about the queues.
Why would the rank queues be remove at some point in the day?

Question/s :D

#1 Why remove queues in the first place?
#2 Why at that time?
#3 Do you guys hate me for making this?
#4 Are you guys able to remove queues at a better time? (I play in the afternoon as well but it I'm not in the mood to play by that point because I might be tilted. Its a habit I have of getting mad xD)
#5 Why is dominion still part as a game mode in the home page ;)
#6 Will you have a good day?

This is from the worst sliver 5 player (Not bronze :D)

I hope you have a wonderful day.     

#GETTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTTT {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
